## RateLimitOptions

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/utils/useful-stuff/ratelimiter.ts" sourceLine="42" packageName="commandkit" />

Configuration options for rate limiting

```ts title="Signature"
interface RateLimitOptions {
    maxRequests?: number;
    interval?: number;
    storage?: RateLimitStorage;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### maxRequests

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`number`}   />

Maximum number of requests allowed per interval. Default: 10
### interval

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`number`}   />

Time interval in milliseconds for the rate limit window. Default: 60000
### storage

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/rate-limit-storage#ratelimitstorage'>RateLimitStorage</a>`}   />

Storage implementation for persisting rate limit data. Default: <a href='/docs/next/api-reference/commandkit/classes/memory-rate-limit-storage#memoryratelimitstorage'>MemoryRateLimitStorage</a>


</div>
